name: Little Races
description:
Little Races is a really addictive game, great fun at a very good price, and above all, many possibilities and ways to play, you can play by yourself, or you can even play with another person locally (with split screen).

The mechanics is that of a normal racing game. Being able to choose several scenarios, you will have to run and try to do it in the fastest way, the one that before will win.

Some features:

-9 Different races included

-3 different difficulties of AI

-8 Vehicles ( truck, buggy, classic, van ...) in 8 colors

-Simple yet efective graphics and style


Game modes :

-Championship
-Arcade
-Time trial.

3 Ways of playing:

-Single player ( 1 player + 3 CPU cars).
-2 players splitscreen ( 2 players + 2 CPU cars).
-Local score leaderboard.
